nodes.text: Attichitcuk's family was a Wookiee clan that lived in Rwookrrorro. This clan brought to the galaxy many exceptional warriors, skilled pilots and even a Jedi Knight. The Chevappa clan was their ally, but they also had many arguments with other families.

In The Star Wars 7, Chewbacca's family is identified as the "Sawa tribe", one of the most powerful Wookiee tribes, whose father (here spelled as "Auzituck") is a prince. In The Star Wars 8, however, the family is referred to as "the great Kaapauku tribe".
